inputs.name: tenantId
inputs.label: AzureAD tenant ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the AzureAD **tenant ID** for the registered app. [Microsoft Docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/quickstart-register-app)

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.label: AzureAD client ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the AzureAD **client ID** for the registered app. [Microsoft Docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/quickstart-register-app)

inputs.name: clientSecret
inputs.label: AzureAD client secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the AzureAD **client secret** for the registered app. [Microsoft Docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/quickstart-register-app#add-a-client-secret)

inputs.name: driveId
inputs.label: SharePoint Online drive ID or URL
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Enter the Microsoft Graph **drive ID** or the **full URL** to the SharePoint document library. [Microsoft Docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/drive?view=graph-rest-1.0) Examples:
 DriveId: `b!X22Adlah_hsw...`
URL: `https://contoso.sharepoint.com/sites/project-x/Shared%20Documents`

inputs.name: targetFolder
inputs.label: Target folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the target folder path, relative to the drive root.

inputs.name: sourceFolder
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder that the copy pattern(s) will be run from. Empty is the root of the repo. Use variables if files are not in the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: contents
inputs.label: Contents
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The contents that will be copied to the target folder. Wildcards and glob patterns are suppored. Examples:
 `/**/*.txt` to copy all txt files recursively
`**` to copy all files recursively

inputs.name: cleanTargetFolder
inputs.label: Clean Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete all existing files in target folder before copy.

inputs.name: flattenFolders
inputs.label: Flatten Folders
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flatten the folder structure and copy all files into the specified target folder.

inputs.name: failOnEmptySource
inputs.label: Fail if no files found to copy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail if no matching files to be copied are found under the source folder.
